DOC.brief_summary: To determine whether combination gemcitabine/carboplatin hydroxychloroquine ( HCQ ) associate improved clinical outcome ( progression free overall survival ) compare chemotherapy alone patient small cell lung cancer ( SCLC )
DOC.brief_title: STUDY 15 - Comparing Gemcitabine/Carboplatin Hydroxychloroquine Versus Carboplatin/Etoposide Therapy Alone Small Cell Lung Cancer ( SCLC )
DOC.detailed_description: This multicentre , randomise , phase II trial aim compare combination hydroxychloroquine gemcitabine/carboplatin versus standard carboplatin/etoposide chemotherapy , first line treat patient stage IV disease . The standard first line chemotherapy treatment remain platinum-based chemotherapy unchanged 20 year . Novel active treatment approach urgently need improve survival SCLC . Patients randomise one two treatment arm ; carboplatin/etoposide gemcitabine/carboplatin/hydroxychloroquine .
